Articles.Content:
Nabbed this screenshot on my ejection to Jool a few minutes ago.

My kudos to the men and or women who designed these visuals. I've also witnessed some pretty cool shots from Duna and such. The way it handles lighting in space is just awesome.
IKR!! but i play on my laptop and it sucks and laggs to much i need a better Graphics card.. or something
New graphics card on a laptop? Good luck with that one
Tell that to Acer, integrated graphics in a desktop...

Tell that to Acer, integrated graphics in a desktop...

That's not so much of a problem since desktops are easily upgradable. Thing about laptops, if they're good enough to even have dedicated video, is the card is soldered to the motherboard. Impossible to upgrade.

Just to echo what Aphox said, this game got soooo pretty. Just the basic orbitting is now a jaw droppingly beautiful experience. I finally understand now why the favourite off-duty activity on the ISS is looking out the window.
